transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Phone aaya hua si sir.
Customer: Achcha achcha kahan se baat kar rahe ho sir?
Executive: Sir Punjab se ji.
Customer: Achcha Punjab se kaun si company se sir?
Executive: Sir Rapid Pharmaceuticals se ji.
Executive: Achcha Rapid Pharmaceuticals se Himanshu baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Achcha hanji hanji.
Executive: Ji ji ji video meeting ho rahi thi na aapki Hansika ji se aur Susmita ji se right?
Executive: Aapki ek mail bhi hamare paas aaya tha mail maine.
Customer: Sir koi sunwai nahi ho rahi ji.
Executive: Sir sunwai jaise aapne mail dala aur leads ke regarding jo problem unhone mujhe bataya ki sari jo discussion hui hai kuch leads ka bata rahe ki aapke paas nahi aa raha hai kisi aur ke paas aa raha hai seller ke paas aisa kuch.
Customer: Aise nahi hai na ji. Haan haan.
Executive: Chalo batao pehle aap bata do sir.
Executive: Haan jo maine mail dekha aapne bola ki 40000 ka subscription liya hame koi benefit aaya nahi hai sari chije hai main koi aapki category vagaira dekh raha tha sara kuch dekhne ke baad aapki complaint jo tha wo sara mail bhi main padh raha tha ki haan aapke gap hai aap keh rahe ho benefit aaya bilkul hi aaya nahi do mahine se jab aapka matlab start 60 se complete hua.
Customer: Teen mahine ho gaye ji hanji haan.
Executive: Haan do mahine hue sir abhi do mahine panch din hua.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Chalo.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji ji. To main concern aapne jo mujhe bataya ki aapka jo hai lead disappear ho jata hai ye aapne likha hai. Main jab bhi we click valid it immediately disappear or gets deleted from the dashboard.
Executive: Leads ka problem.
Customer: Sir ye to baad ki baat hai sir meri benti hai ye to baad ki baat hai aapke paas maine do mahine panch din aapke hisab se batao liye hue hain man lo mere paas 200 lead aa gayi ji usme se ye dekho bhi all India se kahin se bhi maine uthai hui hai par jo aayi hui hai na ji wo sir fake matlab ki ya to 15-15 din ki hai panch-panch din ki hai to mera kehne ka maksad ye hai sir matlab ki jo matlab ki kya naam hai IndiaMART hai all India pe kaam kar raha hai te itne matlab ki platform se jude matlab ki hamare paas duniya ke bhar ke aapke paas jude hue hain aapke paas lead hi khatam ho gayi ji hamare liye lead hi nahi hai ji batao aap kaun si lead koi bhi main utha lo na ji mere wala matlab ki platform kahan lead aa rahi hai ji batao sir.
Executive: Humne to consume bhi karwaya aapko video meet pe bula ke online bula ke.
Customer: Sir wo baat alag jab kya karenge meri baat suno aap 10 video karwa do ji par sir jahan matlab ki hamare matlab ki ne jo aapke dwara diya gaya hua hai te us hisab se ham hamara jo matlab ki block hai wo IndiaMART dwara block kar diya gaya hai bhi usme customer na jaye.
Customer: Bas ye baat hai abhi aap karo sabit karo sir sabit karo na sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi aisa kuch bhi nahi hai aisa kuch bhi nahi hai.
Customer: Block ho gaya block kyun kar denge sir aapke liye.
Customer: Ji nahi sir aise nahi hai ji aap mujhe dekho pata kya hai aap kuch bhi kaho kaise bhi karo hum jaise aap man rahe ho hum usi hisab se do mahine teen mahine se hum man rahe hain par baat aisi hai sir us hisab se kaise karoge ji sir aap matlab ki jab lead hi nahi aati savere se sham tak meri ek minute baat sun lo na ji sir savere pata hai kya hai jo aapka package liya hai aapke package ka maksad nahi hai maine do mahine bache ko laga diye uska 10 11 12 lakh ka package hai usko.
Customer: Tokri chudwa rahe hain sath mein teen bande karigar lage hue hain 20-20 15-15 hazar rupya wo laga rahe hain par hum savere se sham tak aapke computer ke sath aise nahi hai bhi ye package lene ke liye baithe the hum isko teen mahine mein bada package karna tha par kya karenge wahan aapke paas lead hi nahi hai ji hamare paas aur kya kahan se aayegi ji to main aap man lo kaam karte hain na ji aapko santushti lage usme usse bada karne ka hamara pura target tha bhi teen mahine mein hum isko double triple le jayenge.
Executive: To abhi to secondary hai pehle hum aapko isme satisfy kar le fir na koi.
Customer: Sir hum lenge kaise lenge ji hum le hi nahi payenge par matlab ki hamare paas lead hi nahi hai aapke paas ji batao kahan hai ji aap 200 lead uthai hui hai jab bhi dekhte hain matlab ki refresh marte hain jo bhi marte hain 15 din purani lead aa jati hai 10 din purani lead jati hai sir lead hamare liye band kahan hogi ji ek kamra hai.
Executive: Aapne 200 valid liya sir aapne keval 100 valid purchase kiya September mein 55 aur October mein 60 valid.
Customer: 115 valid aapne purchase kiya 115 valid aapne purchase kiya package mein sir aapka mahine ka 70 aata hai to 140 valid purchase kar September ke mid mein panch che tarikh ko aapka panch tarikh ko.
Executive: Kitne ho gaye sir?
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Sir uske kya karenge ji jab sir jitni hamari li hai utni bhi hum kya karenge lekar wo 15 din wali aati hai ji jab bhi refresh marwate hain kal bhi refresh marwaya panch din wali aa gayi ji.
Executive: Ek second ek second ek second aap.
Customer: Hanji haan.
Executive: Aapke ek second valid support card aapne jo kal valid purchase kiya hai wo same day ka hai sir 11th November ka hai aapne 10 tarikh ko purchase.
Customer: Sir same date ki to purchase kar rahe ho aap sir aap keh rahe ho 15 din purani valid hai.
Executive: Hanji haan.
Customer: Sir ek minute sir main back call karun ji main kahin baitha tha ji panch minute mein 10 minute mein.
Executive: Main to yahan dekh raha hun na system se aapne jo valid purchase kiya hai.
Customer: Sir koi doctor ke paas baitha hua tha wo sara gadbad ho jayega.
Executive: Theek hai aap kar lijiye main back call karta hun main back call karta hun main kal theek hai sir theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states no leads are being generated.

- States leads are 15-5 days old.

- Believes account is blocked by IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive stated leads issue will be investigated.

- Executive stated account is not blocked.

- Executive mentioned customer purchased 115 valid.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account, block
